Arch Hosting - https://archhosting.net


Arch Hosting is proud to offer high quality virtual servers at an affordable price. When we created our virtual server platform, we had three core goals in mind: speed, reliability, and affordability. The end result was an extremely powerful platform at a very low cost to the consumer - you.


Our infrastructure consists of reliable dedicated servers colocated with CentriLogic for our eastern US locations and QuadraNet for our western US locations. We have now also added a brand new location, Amsterdam in the Netherlands located in Equinix AM11. These datacenters are reputable for their quality networking and impeccable uptime. We take pride in our work, and every part of our infrastructure was built with performance and reliability in mind. We currently have a very limited stock, so don’t delay!


Why Arch Hosting?

  • Premium Support

  • 3 Day Money Back Guarantee - No questions asked.

  • 99.9% Uptime - And an SLA to guarantee it.

  • 10Gbps+ Dedicated Network

  • Legal US business - registered and developed in Arizona.

  • 4 Years In Business - We've been providing reliable hosting services since 2015.

  • IPv6 Ready - Future-proof your business.

What’s so special about your KVM plans?

  • Use the promo code ‘10OFF’ for 10% off your order!

  • RAID10 SSDs

  • DDoS Protection

  • Los Angeles datacenter, great pings to North America and Asia!

  • Amsterdam datacenter, located in the premium Equinix AM11 datacenter making it the best choice for european connectivity.

  • Unbeatable pricing from $3.50/mo!
